dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile shows the lakes and rivers of Uganda. Data were collected in 2005 and 2006.These data are intended for researchers, students, policy makers and the general public for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production.
